Categorize this IT Ticket:

live count visits snow dashboard not working re count visits snow dashboard working hi can you please open incident below data showed for sept well issue with automatic updating does reoccur thanks sent monday october re count visits hi we obtain after doing some formatting our raw data excel we use setup monthly report for checked below link although seem alright trend stops thank you manager sent october re count visits thanks really good happening where can we aggregated number tickets logged via self there dashboard operational insights dashboard embedded true dashboard ca tab ca breakdown source element one you use sent monday october hello go went smoothly friday evening would like thank occasion for his effort great job talked with allow make some tests be everything works supposed taking care propose send tomorrow morning please have look proposed slightly modified version below thank you dear link here video link here please be advised preferred browsers chrome edge we trying our best make portal look better ie well thank you name job title manager

message.reasoning:
**Analyzing Ticket Details**

Okay, I'm working to identify the correct category for this IT ticket. I've broken down the provided text, focusing on keywords to select the right category from the list. It looks like it may be a "Miscellaneous" issue because the initial analysis revealed the statement is not related to any of the other categories.


**Evaluating Reporting Systems**

I've been poring over the ticket text and the themes of dashboards and reporting are emerging as key.  I'm now zeroing in on the system aspects involved, like dashboard functionality and data refreshing. The "aggregated number" and "monthly report" mentions strengthen the data-centric interpretation. It looks like it's a reporting system issue.


**Identifying the Root Cause**

The current focus is on reconciling the user's issue with system functionality. It looks like the ticket encompasses dashboard issues, data discrepancies, and proposed system modifications. I've ruled out Hardware, HR, Access, Storage, and Purchase categories. The "Internal Project" category seems most fitting, however, there are elements of Miscellaneous issues as well. I'm leaning toward "Internal Project" since the ticket describes system modifications. It may overlap with "Miscellaneous" due to its broad nature.


**Determining Best Fit Category**

After careful evaluation, it seems "Internal Project" best encompasses the ticket's core aspects. While there's a strong component of system troubleshooting, the persistent references to dashboard enhancements and a proposed modified version signal that this is more than just a typical glitch report. It is more about ongoing development than an isolated incident. I'm focusing on the "live count" issues and automatic update problems to validate this assumption.


**Pinpointing Primary Focus**

I'm now fully immersed in the ticket's details. The core focus seems to center on an internal system improvement initiative. The "live count" issue and the proposed dashboard tweaks clearly show an active, ongoing effort. The "monthly report" and the desire for enhanced portal functionality solidify this impression.
